title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Setting up this blog
text:
Step 1: Set up a repo at https://github.com/openpencil/doodles and added a .gitignore.
Step 2. Cloned the repo locally:

git clone git@github.com:openpencil/doodles.git

Step 3. Added a Quarto blog

quarto create-project doodles --type website:blog

Step 4. Publish the blog

quarto publish gh-pages 
Thatâ€™s it. These four steps will publish a blog at this address: https://openpencil.github.io/doodles/
Pre-requisites: 1. You will need a git repository called: https://github.com/openpencil/openpencil.github.io
